get.summary: Získať podpísanú URL pre stiahnutie prílohy
List all guardians assigned to the Heart-Beat protocol

post.summary: Assign a guardian to the Heart-Beat protocol with a specific priority

delete.summary: Remove a guardian from the Heart-Beat protocol

guardianId.description: ID of the guardian to assign

priority.description: Order in which the guardian should be contacted (1 is highest priority)
